description.value:
>@UUID[Compendium.sfrpg.archetypes.Item.sTWRGNQuZREcAe4H]{Doshko Specialist}

The fourth tooth tears flesh. A doshko you hold that does not have the @UUID[Compendium.sfrpg.rules.JournalEntry.O5GDQUKPCJ9Zbnfj.JournalEntryPage.zOJ86MDq6kNzAAbB#wound]{wound} or @UUID[Compendium.sfrpg.rules.JournalEntry.O5GDQUKPCJ9Zbnfj.JournalEntryPage.zOJ86MDq6kNzAAbB#severe-wound]{severe wound} critical hit effect gains the effects of the @UUID[Compendium.sfrpg.equipment.Item.78g7h7nN3gWIY4ut]{wounding} weapon fusion. When you score a critical hit with a doshko with the wound or severe wound critical hit effect, you can spend 1 Resolve Point to choose the next-highest result from the Wounding Weapons table after rolling. When you score a critical hit with a doshko with the severe wound critical hit effect, you also increase the DC to save against it by 2.
